title: fix: improve working for eval jsonpath selector

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Update UI text from "JSON Selector" to "JsonPath" in `InnerEvalConfigForm` for clarity. > > - **UI Text Update**: > - Change "JSON Selector" to "JsonPath" in `InnerEvalConfigForm` component in `evaluator-form.tsx`. > - Update description to "Use JsonPath syntax..." for clarity and consistency. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 68f5139087e4193fefd4fc4bf656d03920d1be51. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
